name: Weather Wizard
description:
How To Play:
1.Use the arrow keys or WASD
2.Click to to shoot a spell to kill enemy's
3.The weather will change once in a while
4.Your spell will be linked with the weather
 5.You have 3 lives when the enemy's hit you you lose a life
6.When you have 0 life's you will die
7.Try to get a big HIGHSCORE!
